App Description for Dunk n Beat

Brief: Immerse yourself in the rhythmic world of 'Dunk n Beat'â€”a fusion of basketball and music that offers an electrifying arcade experience. Set your basketballs ablaze and groove to popular tunes as you navigate through progressively challenging levels. With gameplay designed for one-finger control, it's a game that's easy to pick up but hard to master, perfect for anyone looking to test their timing and rhythm.
